item.title: Welcome to my new website & blog...
item.description: Well, it was in my mind for some time, to register my domain name and finally its here :) . I have imported all the posts from my blog on blogger. I will be checking and editing all the posts for any kind of issues with wordpress. If you see anything out of the way do let me know :)
